root.str: Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "Q" Gold Hood Ornament.
The Corona Infrared optic has no magnification, but highlights nearby targets to aid the shooter in low-light scenarios.
Increases the time it takes to lock-on to the vehicle by 0.5 seconds and prevents the vehicle from automatically appearing to hostiles based on proximity or radar detection.
Further increases the range of the Radar Scrambler
Overload detected in terminal control generator.
Holding down the sprint key while moving will make you run faster, but you cannot use any weapons while sprinting and it takes longer to pull out your weapon after you stop.
Find any enemy that has a bounty and get the kill on them to fulfill the contract.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 missiles.
Nanite Systems' refined ACRA 3.4x zoom optic provides the user with better clarity on mid-range targets.
Apply the Intertwined camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> These anchors are capable of shaping the entire planet in a matter of days. I have seen it myself.
Increases the range and duration that soldiers can be resupplied by the ammunition pack

USE
Use a Bastion Terminal. There is one in each warpgate.

DESCRIPTION
Must be have appropriate outfit permission to use "Use Reserved Asset".

Bring your ourfit bastion planetside to join the battle on the continent.Max 1.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 14 shells.

Nanite Systems Auraxium Holiday Hat.
+10% xp when worn

This item is only usable during the winter holiday season.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
The pilot of this vehicle has disconnected!
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Improves your sprinting acceleration, deceleration, and recovery speeds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.
Apply the Pumpkin Patch camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 50 rounds.
Bends light around the infiltrator, resulting in near perfect invisibility while motionless. Cloak lasts for up to 12 seconds, and regenerates to full in 9 seconds.
This low-range thermal optic highlights enemy infantry and vehicles, allowing target differentiation even through smoke or in darkness.
An emission condenser reduces noise, muzzle flash, and prevents the player from showing on the minimap when firing, but bullet velocity is reduced by 20%.
Stop shooting! We're on the same side!
We have a new Spawn location.
Regions disconnected from your warpgate will not grant resources.

Continually regenerating its cutting edge thanks to an embedded nanoconstructor, the Damascus Edge's patterned blade and cutting ability are thanks to a molecular structure similar to the legendary steel of the same name.
Further increases the range of the IFF Device
Gunner Kill Assist Share - Wasp Prototype
Kill hostiles that have a bounty.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Download complete. Our team will begin preliminary analysis on the data. Look around if you wish, but you will need to redeploy to escape the underground lab.
Highlights vehicular threats in low light conditions up to 350 meters.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> First we will need you to install an implant, what we call an Analysis HUD, to better relay your field data. Representative Ayla has one waiting for you, please speak with her in the Atrium.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 6 rounds, and the weapon takes 15% longer to equip and unequip.
The P2-120-R HEAT carries quick-reloading high-explosive anti-tank rounds that have balanced effectiveness against armor and infantry. TR use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.

To help you navigate Auraxis, you can <font color="#7FF4FF">RIGHT CLICK</font> on the map to set a <font color="#7FF4FF">WAYPOINT</font>. If you are a squad or platoon leader, you will have the option to set waypoints that your entire squad or platoon can follow.

This hard hitting but slower firing SMG is used as an efficient personal defense weapon with a solid gold finish. Made by Nanite Systems, the leading Auraxis firearms dealer. All factions can use NS weapons.
[*player1*] has shut down the Tempest Siphon!
The NCM2 Falcon is the standard for the NC's anti-vehicle MAX weaponry. It features powerful warheads capable of heavily damaging enemy vehicles and MAXes alike. NC use only.
VR Training is ideal for practicing vehicle driving and marksmanship.
Increases the maximum duration the shield can remain active to 15 seconds and increases the effect radius to 8 meters.
Apply the Desert Tile camo pattern to your vehicle.
We've routed you to this virtual training simulator. We'll go over the basics to restore your memory. Step on the pad to begin.
Improved hover, air brake and vertical thrust.
Apply the single use Indar Dry Ocean camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
It would be so cool if you could support Planetside 2 AND get great benefits.
Could not invite [*target*] to a squad because they are an enemy.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Flaming Skull Hood Ornament. NC use only.
MAX melee attacks knock back enemies and deal increased damage.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Flash to 21 minutes.
Apply the Scales camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Apply the single use Scrub Forest camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
This enhanced ABLE optic increases zoom depth by up to two times, and uses a simple blue dot for close-mid range accuracy.
Wraps your Valkyrie in a heavy rust trim. All factions can use this.
Carry an additional motion spotter, three total. Only one can be active at a time per infiltrator.
Adds the Overheat Intake to the Galaxy. TR use only.

The Punisher is a next-gen PDW built with close-quarters aggression in mind. The in-built underbarrel fires fragmentation grenades, and can be adapted to fire class-specific ammunition instead. All factions can use NS weapons.
Mine 1000 Cortium ore on Indar or Esamir
Applies a special J!nx Decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Get explosive kills while in the storm
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
The anti-tank AF-22 Crow's powerful warhead and lock-on capabilities have proved the weapon as an effective solution to enemy armor.
While deployed, shares the locations of enemies periodically, and the Infiltrator receives real time positional updates of enemies near the device.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 5%
Improved handling and hill climbing. (All attributes increased over previous rank)
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NSO use only.
Reload Weapons as a Heavy Assault
Improves the top speed of the Liberator in both cruising and afterburner modes.
Increases the top speed of the Vanguard by 8 KPH.
Allows cortium to be used to construct a module that, when powered, protects against aerial bombardment and infantry drops. Structures in range will gain resistance to orbital strike damage. VS only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 11.25%
Allows use of the close range 1x TekLyte sight.
Hold [%s] to proceed to final section of training
Destroy the SCU to prevent enemies from spawning in that spawn room
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rounds.

The heavier Nano-Armor Cloaking device passively grants 100 shield health to the Infiltrator. While the cloak is active, it will also reduce incoming small arms damage by 25%. Nano-armor can remain active for 7.5 seconds and recharges in 12 seconds.
Press [%s] to speak with convoy commander
Demonstrate skill in making things go BOOM.
Use a Warpgate Terminal to transport yourself to Oshur.
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the yaw rate of the Scythe by 4 degrees/second.
Auraxis stands still as [*player*] takes hold of Nightshade.
Apply the Diced camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
Single Use Desert Scrub v1 Weapon Camo

This low altitude hover buoy has been outfitted with a suite of sensors calibrated to measure atmospheric energy. It is also equipped with a self-repair nanite projector that ensures it and any nearby aircraft are able to withstand damage that they sustain.
Get the most popular Sunderer weapons at a discounted price!
Single Use Indar Dunes Armor Camo
Increases sprint speed and jump height after reloading a weapon.
This customization adds a decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
This black left-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.
Adds 2 rounds to the default magazine size.
A HIVE remains dormant until your faction has an available Victory Core, which is then placed into the HIVE nearest an enemy Warp Gate.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 bombs.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 800 rounds.
NC - Sniper Rifle - Long - V3 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.
Holographic laser reflex sight designed to create a lightweight, yet accurate, sight
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 seconds.
Apply the Diced camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.

The haunted version of this facepaint only materializes during the Halloween Event, providing a spooky 10% XP boost while worn. Once the event comes to a grisly end, this item vanishes into the abyss from whence it spawned until next Halloween!
Although slower than the NC standard issue Mag-Cutter, when wielded, this knife can be activated, increasing its damage output. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Changes the quality of graphics. Higher qualities may decrease performance.
Hurry, you qualify for 50% off Daybreak Cash now!
Stealth certification on the Flash has been reduced to 4 ranks like other vehicles. The certification line has been reset and previously spent points have been refunded.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Your position in the vehicle queue is: [*position*].
Allows the use of the Recon Detection Device, which reveals nearby enemies on the minimap.
Applies a decal to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Depending on the weapon, increases ammo capacity per arm by an amount equal to 3 or 6 standard size magazines.
Customize your Vanguard with Bruiser Plating. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon, or vehicle. TR use only.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 3.13% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.

Whenever you spend longer than a total of 12 seconds outside of cloak without taking damage, your cloak's visibility will be reduced by 75%. Dying or taking damage from enemy sources will reset the benefit countdown. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Your outfit has initiated enlistment in the war. In order to confirm your spot, 48 members must sign up.

USE
Claim rewards from the Nascent Expeditions representative on Sanctuary.

DESCRIPTION

Charter an expedition to gather Polystellarite for your Outfit Armory.

Max 1.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Well, that was... Oh, come on. That's only part of the file! Hopefully the rest of it is stored in the same Lab. Check the other consoles.
The Chainblade knife's razor sharp teeth have proven extremely effective in close quarters combat.
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 6 KPH.
Increases the reserve ammo of your rocket launchers by 2 magazines, and holstered rocket launchers will auto-reload every 8 seconds.
Allows use of Scout Rifles in the secondary weapon slot. Does not include Directive reward weapons. Combat Medic only.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Single Use Indar Dry Brush Camo
The Cortium Turbo Engine grants powerful thrust by converting stored minerals into fuel. The C300 consumes 225 Cortium per second.

Despite countless casualties in this war, we persevere. Our spawn matrix ensures that death is fleeting. Embrace the challenge, return the lands of Auraxis to Vanu, and carve a path toward humanity's future.
Use the placement system to place the Orbital Strike beacon
Creates a smoke screen around the aircraft that makes it difficult to see and prevents lock-ons for several seconds. Can be activated once every 60 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 4 missiles.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 152 rounds.
Adds a cosmetic shell to your Drop Pod. All factions can use this gear.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> It's even more lethal the closer you get. Get out of there!
Earned by being the Galaxy pilot when a passenger kills an enemy.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Flash by 25%.
Unlock passive, always-on Certifications for the Scythe.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Walking on the ocean floor will take longer than travelling in a vehicle, but it will be considerably more difficult to detect than a typical land, air, or sea attack.
Reduce the time penalty for swapping between seats within the vehicle.
Decreases the time taken to reload the weapon by 16%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 4 rockets.
Unlocks a profile banner for your character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 192 rounds.
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies one-way shields to structure openings to help protect the defenders inside. NC only.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Prowler. TR use only.
Many TR soldiers praise the Terran Assault Rifle's performance in the field, crediting many victories to its incredible hip fire accuracy and high rate of fire. TR use only.
Adds 4 rounds to the default magazine size.
Creates a long lasting smoke screen around the aircraft that disrupts visibility and lock-ons for 10 seconds.
Adds 3 rockets to the default magazine size.
Get a selection of Harasser weapons and cosmetics at a discounted price!
Interact with the Ground Vehicle terminal.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 rounds.
Apply the single use Indar Savanna camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Applies a Black Desert decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Improved traction, turning, brakes, and reverse speed.
Accepting a revive from a Combat Medic removes the death from your statistics!
Advanced targeting system can lock-on to air and ground vehicles
Adds the Goliath style hubcaps to your Flash. NC use only.
Customize your Flash with this white blinking antenna ball. NC use only.
The H-V45 was created with a focus on close quarters mobility. Its light weight does not slow the shooter as much as most other weapons in its class. VS use only.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Colossus. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
The Vanu Sovereignty has defended Zurvan!
Adds 19 rounds to the default magazine size.

Stand near control points to capture them. Once a majority of a facility's control points are owned by an empire then that empire will start contesting ownership of the facility. The facility will be captured when the facility's capture progress bar fills all the way.
T2 Striker High Capacity Rocket Launcher
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Deploy to a different continent by using a Warpgate Terminal; they are found in Warpgates and have a globe icon above them.
This enhanced ABLE optic increases zoom depth by up to two times, and uses a green bracket reticle for close-mid range engagements.
The Vanu Sovereignty has taken Peris!
Aircraft: Destroy 50 vehicles using the liberator
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 1 round, and the weapon takes 15% longer to equip and unequip.
This customization adds a Dark Purple decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
Apply the Flame camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
You already own the following items in this bundle.
TR - Shared - Heavy Pistol - V5 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Increases the amount of ammo carried

The Glaive Ionized Particle Cannon is unmanned mid-range artillery that disrupts defensive shield systems but only inflicts minor damage to personnel and equipment due to its lack of conventional payload. The IPC requires AI module support as well as a manually fired targeting dart to acquire a target.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 rockets.
Jokingly referred to as the "broomstick," this adapter reserves 9 rounds from the magazine to add an alternate fire mode that unleashes a torrent of rounds after a short spinup.
Apply the Temperate Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.

NANITES
Nanites are used to spawn vehicles and resupply consumable items. This resource regenerates over time.

Max 750.
[*target*] failed to leave the platoon due to bad player group.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Inertial Dampener 5
One less Vanguard to deal with.
Apply the Desert Scrub v2 camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 250 health. This effect does not trigger from quick melee attacks.
This customization adds a Tiger Face decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
The [*faction*] has linked to the southwest warpgate +[*points*] VP!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.
Premium Tier 1: +24.0 Daily Passive Cert Points
Apply the single use Northern Forest camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
A high density particle field that helps protect the user from injury. The shield will regenerate over time if not receiving damage.
Unlock all 41 camos available in the store at a huge discount with this Mega Armor Camo Bundle!
The spooky season is upon us, and so are these Halloween themed items!
The 100mm Lightning Turret focuses the lightning into an anti-armor role.
Further reduces the time to transition in and out of Sprint Mode.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Apply the single use Amerish Forest v2 camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Adds the Tubular Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
The TS6 Wolf is a popular choice amongst TR infantry due to the considerable stopping power of the 11mm round.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 500 rounds.
Medical Applicator. Use to heal and revive your teammates.
Allows the engineer to construct a MANA anti-vehicle missile turret. The missile is laser guided and requires the operator to guide the missile to its target.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Tough Voice Pack. NC Female use only.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Prowler to 7 minutes.
This customization adds a Daisy decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Engineering:</font> Damage report! Starboard engine component has been damaged!
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Causes the HUD to highlight and track hostile aircraft at a range of 600 meters.
This customization adds a decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.48 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 rockets.
This customization adds a Targeting decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
Further reduces the amount of damage taken from explosions.
While in VR training, you can click on a certification to equip it without unlocking it.
Apply the single use Temperate Chaparral camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

When activated, the vehicle is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields and avoid damage caused by collisions with other vehicles. Lasts 15 seconds. Can be activated once every 55 seconds.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
Streamlines the Mosquito's performance in favor of dogfighting manuevers. It Improves the turn power, roll power and overall agility of the Mosquito.
Apply the Digital camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
The vehicle pad is where your vehicles will appear
Single Use Indar Rock Vehicle Camo
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 125 rounds.
Causes the HUD to highlight and track hostile aircraft at a range of 500 meters.
Increases the repair speed of the Nano-Armor Kit; this variant is also able to disarm and deconstuct enemy Tank Mines.
<font color="#7FF4FF">/orders</font> - Sends a text message to all allies on your current continent. The Command Comm Channel certification must be purchased to use.

When your shield breaks, it releases a pulse of repairing nanites that heal allied mechanical objects within 10m for 300 health over 4 seconds, short circuits small enemy deployables within range of the pulse. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>
Increases xp gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 12 months. Squad xp bonus stacks with other squad xp boosts. Boost can only be used on this character.
Gunner Kill Assist Share - Drop Pod
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Apply the Grey camo pattern to your vehicle.
Reduces screen shake and flinch caused from damage and explosives.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Reaver to 7 minutes.
To complete your training, use Join Combat to get into the fight!

The Proximity Radar certification for the Lightning has been removed from the Utility slot and certification points have been refunded. Proximity Radar is now available as a Defense slot certification and can be repurchased there.
While cloaked the infiltrator can sprint faster, but will take 60% more damage
The heavy-hitting Eidolon VE33 features accurate semi-automatic fire capable of dropping distant targets with ease. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
Allows Bouncing Betty Mines to be carried in the Utility Pouch, increasing the overall carrying capacity by 1.
Unlocks the AMS-M which allows the Sunderer to deploy, making it a respawn point, giving it shields and resistance to collisions.
Apply the single use Temperate Forest camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 10%
Adds violet chassis lights to the under carriage of the Magrider. VS use only.
Customize your Flash with this cyan blinking antenna ball. NC use only.
Designed for mining in low pressure environments or looking awesome in regular pressure environments. NC use only.
Thumper impacts now strip 125 shield health, 20% of maximum ability energy, and will immediately destroy small deployables caught in the impact area, but blast damage is reduced to 200.

Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.

Improved hover, air brake, and vertical thrust.

Choose your deployment destination by selecting it from the list on the top left or by selecting the location directly on the map. The nearest spawn point is always selected by default.

The Illumniated Apex Helmet is based on ancient but effective designs that originated on Earth hundreds of years ago. NC use only.

The playful Tengu SMG scatters four pellets per shot, and narrows its pellet spread while aiming down sights. All factions can use NS weapons.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 7.5% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Representative Foster is located on the Observation Deck in Sanctuary.
Every facility has a vehicle terminal, but not all vehicles are available at every facility.
The classes and vehicles screens provide multiple loadouts for you to customize. Loadouts allow you to switch your weapons, tools and cosmetics quickly.

Equips a micro-missile launcher with seeking capabilities.
